data.title: John Saxon Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about John Saxon on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature John Saxon including Beverly Hills Cop III, From Dusk Till Dawn, and more.
data.text:
Hooray for Homicide

Jessica Fletcher arrives in Hollywood to protest the filming of her novel and preventing it from becoming a trashy movie only to find herself heading the list of murder suspects.

A Very Good Year for Murder

A vintner's (Eli Wallach) heirs become suspects when a body is found in a wine cellar. Kristian Alfonso and John Saxon also guest star.

Grave Danger, Part I

The CSI teams come together to save one of their own when they learn one team member has been kidnapped and buried alive, and now they must find him before he suffocates under 5 feet of dirt.

Menage-a-Phyllis

Looking for intellectual stimulation, Phyllis begins to date a man platonically, but the situation heats up when he takes an interest in Mary.
